segment.source: DaRT 8.0 Privacy Statement
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 Privacy Statement

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 Privacy Statement
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 Privacy Statement

segment.source: DaRT 8.0 Privacy Statement
segment.target: DaRT 8.0 Privacy Statement

segment.source: Microsoft is committed to protecting your privacy, while delivering software that brings you the performance, power, and convenience you desire in your personal computing.
segment.target: Microsoft is committed to protecting your privacy, while delivering software that brings you the performance, power, and convenience you desire in your personal computing.

segment.source: This privacy statement explains many of the data collection and use practices of Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (“DaRT”).
segment.target: This privacy statement explains many of the data collection and use practices of Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (“DaRT”).

segment.source: This disclosure focuses on features that communicate with the Internet and is not intended to be an exhaustive list.
segment.target: This disclosure focuses on features that communicate with the Internet and is not intended to be an exhaustive list.

segment.source: Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (“DaRT”) enables administrators to easily recover PCs that have become unusable, rapidly diagnose probable causes of issues, and quickly repair unbootable or locked-out systems, all faster than the average time it takes to reimage the machine.
segment.target: Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (“DaRT”) enables administrators to easily recover PCs that have become unusable, rapidly diagnose probable causes of issues, and quickly repair unbootable or locked-out systems, all faster than the average time it takes to reimage the machine.

segment.source: When necessary, you can also quickly restore critical lost files.
segment.target: When necessary, you can also quickly restore critical lost files.

segment.source: This release provides support for Windows 8 Beta as well as improvements on image creation and new hardware and software coverage.
segment.target: This release provides support for Windows 8 Beta as well as improvements on image creation and new hardware and software coverage.

segment.source: Collection and Use of Your Information
segment.target: Collection and Use of Your Information

segment.source: The information we collect from you will be used by Microsoft and its controlled subsidiaries and affiliates to enable the features you are using and provide the service(s) or carry out the transaction(s) you have requested or authorized.
segment.target: The information we collect from you will be used by Microsoft and its controlled subsidiaries and affiliates to enable the features you are using and provide the service(s) or carry out the transaction(s) you have requested or authorized.

segment.source: It may also be used to analyze and improve Microsoft products and services.
segment.target: It may also be used to analyze and improve Microsoft products and services.

segment.source: We may send certain mandatory service communications such as welcome letters, billing reminders, information on technical service issues, and security announcements.
segment.target: We may send certain mandatory service communications such as welcome letters, billing reminders, information on technical service issues, and security announcements.

segment.source: Some Microsoft services may send periodic member letters that are considered part of the service.
segment.target: Some Microsoft services may send periodic member letters that are considered part of the service.

segment.source: We may occasionally request your feedback, invite you to participate in surveys, or send you promotional mailings to inform you of other products or services available from Microsoft and its affiliates.
segment.target: We may occasionally request your feedback, invite you to participate in surveys, or send you promotional mailings to inform you of other products or services available from Microsoft and its affiliates.

segment.source: In order to offer you a more consistent and personalized experience in your interactions with Microsoft, information collected through one Microsoft service may be combined with information obtained through other Microsoft services.
segment.target: In order to offer you a more consistent and personalized experience in your interactions with Microsoft, information collected through one Microsoft service may be combined with information obtained through other Microsoft services.

segment.source: We may also supplement the information we collect with information obtained from other companies.
segment.target: We may also supplement the information we collect with information obtained from other companies.

segment.source: For example, we may use services from other companies that enable us to derive a general geographic area based on your IP address in order to customize certain services to your geographic area.
segment.target: For example, we may use services from other companies that enable us to derive a general geographic area based on your IP address in order to customize certain services to your geographic area.

segment.source: Except as described in this statement, personal information you provide will not be transferred to third parties without your consent.
segment.target: Except as described in this statement, personal information you provide will not be transferred to third parties without your consent.

segment.source: We occasionally hire other companies to provide limited services on our behalf, such as packaging, sending and delivering purchases and other mailings, answering customer questions about products or services, processing event registration, or performing statistical analysis of our services.
segment.target: We occasionally hire other companies to provide limited services on our behalf, such as packaging, sending and delivering purchases and other mailings, answering customer questions about products or services, processing event registration, or performing statistical analysis of our services.

segment.source: We will only provide those companies the personal information they need to deliver the service, and they are prohibited from using that information for any other purpose.
segment.target: We will only provide those companies the personal information they need to deliver the service, and they are prohibited from using that information for any other purpose.

segment.source: Microsoft may access or disclose information about you, including the content of your communications, in order to: (a) comply with the law or respond to lawful requests or legal process; (b) protect the rights or property of Microsoft or our customers, including the enforcement of our agreements or policies governing your use of the services; or (c) act on a good faith belief that such access or disclosure is necessary to protect the personal safety of Microsoft employees, customers, or the public.
segment.target: Microsoft may access or disclose information about you, including the content of your communications, in order to: (a) comply with the law or respond to lawful requests or legal process; (b) protect the rights or property of Microsoft or our customers, including the enforcement of our agreements or policies governing your use of the services; or (c) act on a good faith belief that such access or disclosure is necessary to protect the personal safety of Microsoft employees, customers, or the public.

segment.source: We may also disclose personal information as part of a corporate transaction such as a merger or sale of assets.
segment.target: We may also disclose personal information as part of a corporate transaction such as a merger or sale of assets.

segment.source: Information that is collected by or sent to Microsoft by DaRT may be stored and processed in the United States or any other country in which Microsoft or its affiliates, subsidiaries, or service providers maintain facilities.
segment.target: Information that is collected by or sent to Microsoft by DaRT may be stored and processed in the United States or any other country in which Microsoft or its affiliates, subsidiaries, or service providers maintain facilities.

segment.source: Microsoft abides by the safe harbor framework as set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of data from the European Union, the European Economic Area, and Switzerland.
segment.target: Microsoft abides by the safe harbor framework as set forth by the U.S. Department of Commerce regarding the collection, use, and retention of data from the European Union, the European Economic Area, and Switzerland.

segment.source: Collection and Use of Information about Your Computer
segment.target: Collection and Use of Information about Your Computer

segment.source: When you use software with Internet-enabled features, information about your computer ("standard computer information") is sent to the Web sites you visit and online services you use.
segment.target: When you use software with Internet-enabled features, information about your computer ("standard computer information") is sent to the Web sites you visit and online services you use.

segment.source: Microsoft uses standard computer information to provide you Internet-enabled services, to help improve our products and services, and for statistical analysis.
segment.target: Microsoft uses standard computer information to provide you Internet-enabled services, to help improve our products and services, and for statistical analysis.

segment.source: Standard computer information typically includes information such as your IP address, operating system version, browser version, and regional and language settings.
segment.target: Standard computer information typically includes information such as your IP address, operating system version, browser version, and regional and language settings.

segment.source: In some cases, standard computer information may also include hardware ID, which indicates the device manufacturer, device name, and version.
segment.target: In some cases, standard computer information may also include hardware ID, which indicates the device manufacturer, device name, and version.

segment.source: If a particular feature or service sends information to Microsoft, standard computer information will be sent as well.
segment.target: If a particular feature or service sends information to Microsoft, standard computer information will be sent as well.

segment.source: The privacy details for each DaRT feature, software or service listed in this privacy statement describe what additional information is collected and how it is used.
segment.target: The privacy details for each DaRT feature, software or service listed in this privacy statement describe what additional information is collected and how it is used.

segment.source: Security of your information
segment.target: Security of your information

segment.source: Microsoft is committed to helping protect the security of your information.
segment.target: Microsoft is committed to helping protect the security of your information.

segment.source: We use a variety of security technologies and procedures to help protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
segment.target: We use a variety of security technologies and procedures to help protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.

segment.source: For example, we store the information you provide on computer systems with limited access, which are located in controlled facilities.
segment.target: For example, we store the information you provide on computer systems with limited access, which are located in controlled facilities.

segment.source: Changes to this privacy statement
segment.target: Changes to this privacy statement

segment.source: We will occasionally update this privacy statement to reflect changes in our products, services, and customer feedback.
segment.target: We will occasionally update this privacy statement to reflect changes in our products, services, and customer feedback.

segment.source: When we post changes, we will revise the "last updated" date at the top of this statement.
segment.target: When we post changes, we will revise the "last updated" date at the top of this statement.

segment.source: If there are material changes to this statement or in how Microsoft will use your personal information, we will notify you either by posting a notice of such changes prior to implementing the change or by directly sending you a notification.
segment.target: If there are material changes to this statement or in how Microsoft will use your personal information, we will notify you either by posting a notice of such changes prior to implementing the change or by directly sending you a notification.

segment.source: We encourage you to periodically review this statement to be informed of how Microsoft is protecting your information.
segment.target: We encourage you to periodically review this statement to be informed of how Microsoft is protecting your information.

segment.source: For More Information
segment.target: For More Information

segment.source: Microsoft welcomes your comments regarding this privacy statement.
segment.target: Microsoft welcomes your comments regarding this privacy statement.

segment.source: If you have questions about this statement or believe that we have not adhered to it, please contact us.
segment.target: If you have questions about this statement or believe that we have not adhered to it, please contact us.

segment.target: What This Feature Does:

segment.source: Microsoft Update is a service that provides Windows updates as well as updates for other Microsoft software.
segment.target: Microsoft Update is a service that provides Windows updates as well as updates for other Microsoft software.

segment.source: Windows Defender Offline
segment.target: Windows Defender Offline

segment.source: What This Feature Does:
segment.target: What This Feature Does:

segment.source: Windows Defender Offline (WDO) is included in the DaRT download.
segment.target: Windows Defender Offline (WDO) is included in the DaRT download.

segment.source: WDO helps protect your PC from malicious software (malware) such as viruses, spyware, and other potentially harmful software.
segment.target: WDO helps protect your PC from malicious software (malware) such as viruses, spyware, and other potentially harmful software.

segment.source: Information Collected, Processed, or Transmitted:
segment.target: Information Collected, Processed, or Transmitted:

segment.source: For details about what information is collected and how it is used, see the WDO Privacy Statement at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246081.
segment.target: For details about what information is collected and how it is used, see the WDO Privacy Statement at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246081.

segment.source: Use of Information:
segment.target: Use of Information:

segment.source: For details about what information is collected and how it is used, see the WDO Privacy Statement at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246081.
segment.target: For details about what information is collected and how it is used, see the WDO Privacy Statement at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=246081.
